column1: Uchi////Went to dinner at Uchi last night for the first time and I had a wonderful experience! Apparently DJ Khaled had been here when Beyonc√© came to town for her concert so it got even more popular. They gave us a warm towel to start us off and a cup of sake in a box that traditional Japanese drink out of...then We continued with Hama chili
column4: Nasu and hamachi for the main course
column5: finally ended with fried milk for dessert! I would have to say this had to be considered my cheat meal for the week but sooo worth it
